description: A intense and spicy cherry mix to use for desserts or meats.
name: Cherries Soaked in Brandy Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a pot, bring the water and sugar the boil and then simmer for minutes until the sugar has melted. Add all the spices to the mix and allow to simmer for a further 3 minutes until the water starts to reduce.
Remove from the heat and add the cherries and brandy to the mixture and combine fully. Boil a suitable and sealable glass container to sterilise and then allow to cool.
Once the jar is cool, empty contents of the cooled pot ingredients and store in the fridge.
